1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah said:"Allah's Messenger went out to relieve himself. So he said: 'Bring me tree stones.'" He said, "So I came with two stones and a piece of dung. So he took the two stones, and left the dung. He said: 'It is Riks (a degenerative or filthy thing)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِسْتِنْجَاءِ بِالْحَجَرَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Istinja With Two Stones
